levels.name: Simple Sentences
levels.instructions: Rewrite the given sentence correctly. Focus on capitalization, punctuation, and subject–verb agreement.

questions.incorrect: my father work in a bank
questions.hint: Check the verb for the singular subject 'my father'.
questions.correct: My father works in a bank.

questions.hint: Use the plural form of 'to be' with 'they'.

questions.incorrect: a beautiful flower grow in the garden
questions.hint: Check subject-verb agreement for 'a beautiful flower'.
questions.correct: A beautiful flower grows in the garden.

questions.hint: Use the correct negative contraction for third-person singular.

levels.name: Intermediate Sentences
levels.instructions: Level 2: Improve sentence complexity — check tense consistency, articles, and clearer modifiers.

questions.incorrect: after he came home he have dinner
questions.hint: Sequence: past event then past; use correct past form.
questions.correct: After he came home, he had dinner.

questions.incorrect: i have visited Lahore last year
questions.hint: Use the correct past tense expression for a specific past time.

questions.incorrect: she is the tallest of the two sisters
questions.correct: She is the taller of the two sisters.

questions.incorrect: because he was late, so he missed the bus
questions.correct: Because he was late, he missed the bus.

questions.incorrect: hardly I had reached home when it started rain
questions.hint: Phrase order for 'hardly' and correct verb form for 'rain'.
questions.correct: Hardly had I reached home when it started to rain.
